description: Barak, Ehud, 1942- -- Photographs; Lautman, Dov, 1936- -- Photographs
label: Deputy Chief of Staff Aluf Ehud Barak visited today the President of the Manufacturers Association addressing on the effect of the Gulf crisis as far as the costs to Israel to keep the army on a high state of alert.
